1 - Each player discards 1 card, mills 1 card, and sacrifices a creature, enchantment or artifact
2,3 - Each player sacrifices 1 legendary permanent and {X} creature(s)
4,5 - The Raid Monster deals 5 damage to every player and 3 to every planeswalker
6,7 - The Raid Monster gains 5 life and removes 5 infect counters
8,9 - Until the beginning of the Monster`s next turn, players cannot draw more than 2 cards or play more than two spells each turn
10,11 - Each player sacrifices half the number of tokens they control. (Except for the raid monster)
12,13 - Place {XP}, {X}/{X} flying defender creature tokens in front of the Raid Monster
14,15 - Each player sacrifices {X/2} enchantment(s)
16,17 - Each player sacrifices {X/2} Artifact(s)
18,19 - Each player exiles half their graveyard and drains {X} life
20 - Each player may immediately draw a card, place a land from their hand into play, and gain 5 life
